import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import React from 'react'; import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from 'react-leaflet' export default function Contacto() { const position = [51.505, -0.09] function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_9w4onv5', 'template_3gy54ig', e.target, 'user_NprwZ3CIQSY9oF10i3uGX') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); e.target.reset() } return (
A pretty CSS3 popup.
Easily customizable.
